text: RAG stands for Retrieval-Augmented Generation. It allows AI models to fetch relevant documents before generating an answer.
FastAPI is a modern, fast Python web framework for building APIs with automatic documentation.
Cohere provides large language models and embeddings to create AI applications that can understand and generate text.
You can store documents in CSV, JSON, or a database and use a retriever to fetch the most relevant information.
Chunking long documents helps the AI process large texts without exceeding context limits.
